alert.note: Alert for Beaverhead (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 12 at 4:46PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Beaverhead County through 530 PM MDT... At 446 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 18 miles northwest of Dillon, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of central Beaverhead County. This includes Interstate 15 between mile markers 73 and 75 . MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM MDT for southwestern Montana.
